name: Golden Gear [1]
description: Head protector made of gold. It's very hard with a high Def because it's mainly made of gold. Indestructible.

name: Golden Luckybag
description: Dingling~ This is a luckybag that can drop golden nuggets! It once was the secret of Rune Midgard top wealthy merchant, whoever got it may be the next billionaire.
effect: All Attributes ＋1,Job Exp for killing monsters ＋5%

name: Golden March Blueprint
description: It's the early autumn Belvedere Palace's servants were busy in and out for the incoming big tea party. Ladies will wear luxury clothes and dazzling diamonds from the world will attend the feast. It's an aesthetical impact. The "show" will start in the drumbeats of Royal Honor Guard.

name: Golden Ornament
description: A simple gold bracelet. It shines lights in the dark.

name: Golden Ornament [1]
description: A simple gold bracelet. It shines lights in the dark.

name: Golden Rod Staff [2]
description: A staff with the force of whirling wind.

name: Golden Rod Staff [3]
description: A staff with the force of whirling wind.

name: Goodwill Cake
description: A cake enchanted with mysterious magic spell, has a wonderful smell. It was made by a witch in an accident. "Eat it, all your wishes will come true!"

name: Gorgeous Card Album
description: Kafra's secretive partners have struck a business deal with the Emile family, This Gorgeous Card Album was compiled by the Emil family and issued by Kafra. Based on the cooperation terms, This card collection is only sold with Gratitude Bag, a player can open it to find mysterious cards. (Cards opened in the Gorgeous Card Album can unlock Adventure Handbook)
